name: VulnCheck
description: VulnCheck is a cyber threat intelligence provider that provides exploit and vulnerability intelligence to organizations

options.name: VulnCheck API URL
options.description: The base URL to the VulnCheck API you wish to use. Defaults to "https://api.vulncheck.com/".

options.name: API Key
options.description: Account API key used to access VulnCheck API.

options.name: Search using the Premium API
options.description: If checked, the integration will search indices available to premium subscription accounts.  When unchecked, the VulnCheck Community indices will be used (only supports CVE lookups)
